item.title: Flooding, 28th April
item.description:
Apparently this was looked at by highways Well obviously it wasn’t I shall be making a claim as to unable to get out of our drive like last time with the water ingress nearly into our houses How can we visit our disabled parents and daughter This is Rediculous Glebe road no 22-21 prestbury Just do your job the soak away on the green isn’t working How many times do I have to say It’s just not acceptable in today society

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Chiltern Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Flytipped car wheel table and plastic, 27th April
item.description:
Hi, there are multiple flytipped items on the overgrown space at the corner of Swindon Street. Theres a sign up saying CCTV is in operation and flytipping is prohibited but its unclear how enforcement is carried out. Incidentally there was a commitment made by housing developers when they were building on Granville Street adjacent to this area that they would install community benches on the green for residents to use. This has not materialised and now the site is effectively derelict. Is there any possibility of requesting a followup from whoever had committed to improving the green space site? Thank you so much :) Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Granville Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recurring problem. Sink hole poorly repaired., 27th April
item.description:
Yet again the road surface has been poorly repaired. Drivers forced on wrong side of road to avoid. Please do a proper job and get it mended once and for all.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenhills Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Reported before. You sent me an email to say it’s been repaired. No obvious sign to suggest it has been ., 27th April
item.description:
Road surface in front of Croft Road junction is deplorable. Have reported it before. You sent me an email recently saying repair has been done. It hasn’t! Dangerous for drivers trying to avoid area and driving on to wrong side of road to avoid it and similarly dangerous for cyclists for same reason. Please don’t just fill one hole. Resurface and do the job properly. Will save time and money and future frustration if you do so.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Croft Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Racist Graffiti on the walls of the underpass at the Arle Court Roundabout in Cheltenham, 27th April
Road surface issues, 27th April
item.description:
From train station all the way up to St George’s Road there are multiple pot holes, but not only just that the whole surface of the road is uneven, the whole tarmac is damaged and ruined. At some point the council really needs to start considering redoing the whole road instead of keep messing around and doing little repair in couple of spots and leaving the rest of the road. My car and others gets ruined every day driving through this road, it needs proper fixing. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 196, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
